ValidationRule.description: Score must be a whole number from 0-10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=0, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=1, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=2, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=3, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=4, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=5, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=6, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=7, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=8, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=9, Adoption_Consultant_Score__c!=10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scores must be a whole number between 0 and 10.
